name: word (dizsoft)
description:
• This is the best quality game.For all fans of puzzles riddles crosswords and puzzles! 100% Fun! The rules are very simple: 4 pictures (pictures) you need to guess what word they represent. Look at the pics and guess the word. If you are stuck at some level – not a problem use the hint "Delete wrong letters" "Insert the correct letter or Skip the level". The game was originally made only in English. Works on different screens (for tablets and small smartphones) 48+ exciting levels Questions of varying complexity For all ages Beautiful graphics Soundly selected pictures 100% Free! Install the game RIGHT NOW and we guarantee that the Time will fly by! If you have any questions? Write on mail. We will answer you!
  • WHAT\'S NEW
  • -General bug fixes
  • Version: 3.3.2dk
  • Requirements: Android 2.3 and above
  • language: English
  • Setting cache: not required
